{{Infobox officeholder |name = Ahmed Gaid Salah
أحمد قايد صالح |image = Ahmed gaid salah 2006.jpg |office = Vice-Minister of Defense |deputy = |term_start = 15 September 2013 |term_end = |predecessor = |successor = |office1 = [[Chief of Staff of the People's National Army]] |term_start1 = 2004 |term_end1 = |predecessor1 = [[Mohamed Lamari]] |successor1 = |birth_date = {{birth date and age|1940|01|13|df=y}} |birth_place = [[Batna, Algeria|Batna]], [[Algeria]] |death_date = |death_place = |religion = [[Sunni Islam]] |allegiance = {{flag|Algeria}} |branch = [[File:ANP.png|20px]] [[People's National Army (Algeria)|Algerian People's National Army]] |unit = Corps of Artillery |serviceyears = 1958–present |rank = [[Lieutenant general]] فريق |commands = Chief of Staff of the People's National Army |battles = {{unbulleted list|[[Algerian war of independence]]|[[Sand War]]}} |awards = }} '''Ahmed Gaid Salah''' ({{lang-ar|أحمد قايد صالح}}; born 13 January 1940, in [[Batna, Algeria|Batna]], Algeria) is a senior officer of the [[Algerian army]]. In 2004, he became [[Chief of Staff of the People's National Army|chief of staff]] of the [[People's National Army (Algeria)|Algerian People's National Army]]. In September 2013 he became vice minister of defence.{{cite news|title=Installation du Vice-ministre de la Défense nationale : Ahmed Gaïd Salah affirme que son nouveau poste est une « véritable motivation » pour consentir davantage d’efforts|url=http://www.elmoudjahid.com/fr/actualites/46417|accessdate=26 March 2014|newspaper=[[El Moudjahid]]|date=15 September 2013}}{{cite web|title=Le Protail du Premier Ministre - Gaid Salah Ahmed|url=http://www.premier-ministre.gov.dz/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=2981&Itemid=|publisher=Premier-ministre.gov.dz|accessdate=26 March 2014}} Gaid Salah was promoted to the rank of General in 1993. He is married and father of seven children. ==References== {{reflist}} {{Algeria-bio-stub}} {{DEFAULTSORT:GAID Salah, Ahmed}} [[Category:People from Batna, Algeria]] [[Category:1940 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Government ministers of Algeria]] [[Category:Algerian generals]] [[Category:Members of the National Liberation Front (Algeria)]] [[Category:Chaoui people]]
